name: Yudha
description:
Yudha is Turn based action game with mythological characters from Ramayan.

This Game is made during GameJam+ 2020.

Selected Theme - Local Super heroes.

Used Diversifiers -  Minimal Control,     Hey, I’ve studied this person!.

Categories : #mobile #web #PC

I alone developed this Game. __Rudrac 3d art, programming.

Just Unity. even for art.
